84656.content:
Evo i mog doprinosa, hvala kolegama u temi i @Amon na pomoci!

![](assets/2020-10-27/00012.png)
 >! ```
 >WITH RECURSIVE employees
AS
( (SELECT staff.staff_id, staff.sup_staff_id, staff.last_name, staff.first_name, staff.store_id, payment.amount
 	FROM staff, rental, payment
 	WHERE staff.staff_id = rental.staff_id AND payment.rental_id = rental.rental_id)
	UNION ALL
  (SELECT staff.staff_id, staff.sup_staff_id, staff.last_name, staff.first_name, staff.store_id, employees.amount
	FROM staff, employees
    WHERE staff.staff_id = employees.sup_staff_id)
 )
SELECT rank() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(employees.amount) DESC) AS rankCompany,
	  rank() OVER (PARTITION BY store ORDER BY SUM(employees.amount) DESC) AS rankStore,
      employees.staff_id, employees.last_name AS lname, employees.first_name AS fname,
	  SUM(employees.amount) AS totAmnt
FROM employees NATURAL JOIN store
GROUP BY store_id, employees.staff_id, employees.last_name, employees.first_name
ORDER BY rankCompany, rankStore;

![](assets/2020-10-27/00013.png)
>! ``` 
>WITH RECURSIVE zaposlenici(staff_id, lname, fname, zaposlenik, adresa)
AS
(
SELECT staff_id, last_name, first_name, staff_id, address_id
FROM staff
UNION
SELECT zaposlenici.staff_id, lname, fname, staff.staff_id, staff.address_id
FROM zaposlenici, staff
WHERE zaposlenik = sup_staff_id
)
SELECT
zaposlenici.staff_id,
lname,
fname,
COUNT(DISTINCT country) AS cntDistCountry
FROM zaposlenici, address, city, country
WHERE zaposlenici.staff_id != zaposlenici.zaposlenik AND
address.address_id = zaposlenici.
adresa
AND city.city_id = address.city_id
AND country.country_id = city.country_id
GROUP BY zaposlenici.staff_id, lname, fname
ORDER BY cntDistCountry

![](assets/2020-10-27/00014.png)
>! ```
>SELECT title, array_agg(DISTINCT country ORDER BY country)
FROM inventory, film, store, address, city, country
WHERE inventory.film_id = film.film_id
AND inventory.store_id = store.store_id
AND store.address_id = address.address_id
AND address.city_id = city.city_id
AND city.country_id = country.country_id
AND similarity(title, 'videotejp') > 0.15
GROUP BY title
ORDER BY title;

84841.content:
Evo moj 3., prva dva su ista ko od @keykey (hvala). Mozda je nesto visak al umoran sam.

![](assets/2020-10-27/00040.png)
>! WITH RECURSIVE zaposlenici(staff_id, lname, fname, zaposlenik) AS (

	SELECT staff_id, last_name, first_name, staff_id

	FROM staff

	UNION

	SELECT zaposlenici.staff_id, lname, fname, staff.staff_id

	FROM zaposlenici, staff

	WHERE zaposlenik = sup_staff_id

)

SELECT zaposlenici.staff_id, lname, fname, COUNT(DISTINCT country.country) AS cntDistCountry

FROM zaposlenici, address, city, country, rental, customer

WHERE zaposlenik = rental.staff_id and rental.customer_id = customer.customer_id and address.address_id = customer.address_id

AND city.city_id = address.city_id

AND country.country_id = city.country_id

GROUP BY zaposlenici.staff_id, lname, fname

84848.content:
Evo i moji koji su različiti

![](assets/2020-10-27/00043.png)

>! SELECT title, array_agg(concat_ws('-', category.category_id, category.name) ORDER BY category) AS categories

FROM film, film_category, category

WHERE film.film_id = film_category.film_id

AND film_category.category_id = category.category_id

AND similarity(title, 'kontrol') > 0.15

GROUP BY title

ORDER BY title; 

![](assets/2020-10-27/00044.png)

>! WITH RECURSIVE zaposlenici(staff_id, lname, fname, zaposlenik)

AS

(

    SELECT staff_id, last_name, first_name, staff_id

    FROM staff

    UNION

    SELECT zaposlenici.staff_id, lname, fname, staff.staff_id

    FROM zaposlenici, staff WHERE zaposlenik = sup_staff_id

)

SELECT 

	rank() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT title) DESC) as rank,

	zaposlenici.staff_id, lname, fname, COUNT(DISTINCT title) AS cntDistFilm

FROM zaposlenici, rental, inventory, film

WHERE zaposlenik = rental.staff_id

AND inventory.inventory_id = rental.inventory_id

AND inventory.film_id = film.film_id

GROUP BY zaposlenici.staff_id, lname, fname

ORDER BY staff_id

84879.content:
@Rudee#84875 Ne mogu sad više otvorit review kad sam predo, ali po sjecanju mislim da je doslovno isti tekst zadatka, moguce da grijesim, ne sjecam se sto je bilo drugacije ..

Spremam si sva rjesenja zadaca pa imam upit koji je meni prosao, probaj pejstat, ako ne prode, onda ne znam vise 😁 

`SELECT city, count (customer_id) AS countAdr

FROM customer, address, city

WHERE customer.address_id = address.address_id AND address.city_id = city.city_id AND 

similarity(address, 'dryve') > 0.06

GROUP BY city

order by countAdr desc`
